overview: A few days before an important match, a soccer team is having a physical preparation very intensive at the training center. Those young boys will spend their short rest times in fucking and having sex in so many various places like the massage room, the changing room, the showers and in the toilets. Even the class room will see 3 of them in a very hot sex party. Strong points : greedy blow jobs, solos, big cocks, ass eating, scene with 3 boys and a lot of sensuality.
title: Allez les Bleus !
